name: Quote Pair Extraction
description: Grab text in between quote pairs, but not misc. text in between those quote pairs
content:
"I will capture this group" but not this " I will get this" but not this either

"I even capture this! 98)_(*f0987sdf'\;lk/l,jsdf" but not this ;lskdjgf09436" 'lkjsdflkjlskdjf
author: Deadalus
